Song.Verse:
Darlin' I'm killed,
I'm in puddle on the floor,
waiting for you,
to return.

Oh, what a thrill,
vacillations good Lord,
how youtease me,
how youleave me to burn.

It's so deadly my dear,
the power of loving younear.

Until the day,
until the world falls away,
until yousay, there will no more goodbyes,
Isee it in your eyes,
tomorrow never dies.

Darling youwon,
it's no fun,
martinis, girls and guns,
It's murder on our love affair.

'Cause youbet your life,
every night,
while youchase every morning die,
you're not the only spy out there.

It's so deadly my dear,
the power of wanting younear.

Until the day,
until the world falls away,
until yousay, there will no more goodbyes,
Isee it in your eyes,
tomorrow never dies.

Until the day,
until the world falls away,
until yousay, there will no more goodbyes,
Isee it in your eyes.

Until the day,
until the day,
until the day.
